text: thumb | 220x124px | right | alt= Photo of Dorothy Zinberg outside 10 Downing St | Dorothy Zinberg outside 10 Downing St., London, in 2012 Dorothy Zinberg was an American scholar at Harvard Kennedy School and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. Dorothy Zinberg was the widow of Dr. Norman Zinberg with whom she collaborated on some studies and books. She graduated from Harvard University with a PhD.https://sites.hks.harvard.edu/fs/dzinberg/biography.htm Dorothy Zinberg died Tuesday, 14 April 2020.https://www.hks.harvard.edu/announcements/appreciation-dorothy-zinberg ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:American scientists Category:Harvard University alumni
title: Dorothy Zinberg
